price: 9. Mpe bopesa kilo na bosembo, kasi bobebisa emekeli te.
arabic: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلۡوَزۡنَ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِ وَلَا تُخۡسِرُواْ ٱلۡمِيزَانَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-aqīmū al-wazna bil-qis'ṭi walā tukh'sirū al-mīzāna
